content: just a quick fun cold brew cup cozy pattern that will look great and keep your hands from getting cold what you need 5 00 mm crochet hook or hook to obtain gauge -i used ilty cotton and bernat handicrafter cotton yarn needle -measuring tape -scissors https //aknottyhabitdesigns com/summer-sweet-cold-brew-cozy/ this is for the written crochet pattern only due to the nature of this purchase no refunds will be accepted
